entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Stephenville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:51 AM NST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -14.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Stephenville Airport 2:12 PM NST Friday 24 February 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -14.6°C

Visibility: 12.9 km

entry.title: Friday: Flurries. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 14. Wind chill near minus 26. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 24 February 2023
